select.if: SELECT v.cheliangpaizhao,v.id as vehid,cj.vstatus as status,cj.jiashiyuanid FROM `anbiao_vehicle` v left join ( select vehid,jiashiyuanid,max(createtime) createtime,vstatus from anbiao_cheliang_jiashiyuan_daily where vstatus = 1 GROUP BY vehid,jiashiyuanid,vstatus ) cj on cj.vehid=v.id where v.cheliangpaizhao not like '%挂%' and v.is_deleted = 0 and v.dept_id = #{deptId} order by cj.vstatus

SELECT v.cheliangpaizhao,v.id as vehid,cj.gstatus as status,cj.jiashiyuanid FROM `anbiao_vehicle` v left join ( select jiashiyuanid,gvehid,max(createtime) createtime,gstatus from anbiao_cheliang_jiashiyuan_daily where gstatus = 1 GROUP BY jiashiyuanid,gvehid,gstatus ) cj on cj.gvehid=v.id where v.cheliangpaizhao like '%挂%' and v.is_deleted = 0 and v.dept_id = #{deptId} order by cj.gstatus
